effect.name: Quad Colored Vertex With Manhattan Distance (Texture)
effect.description: This shader is a modification of the Quad shader created by Adam Hawker (aka Sketchy / MuddyMole) and colors each vertex with its own color but with manhattan distance. (Mainly intended for Tails7)
effect.author: Foxioo and Adam Hawker (aka Sketchy / MuddyMole)
